question.questionA: Petals yellow; sepals green; pedicels straight; fruit with a conical beak, spiny.
question.questionB: Petals white; sepals pink; pedicels curved around the stem; fruit with a flattened sword-shaped beak, not spiny.

question.questionA: Cauline leaves absent; capsule not reticulately veined.
question.questionB: Cauline leaves present; capsule reticulately veined.
